name: Top down shooter zombie X
description:
Welcome to my GAME, Zombie X... (or something like that.)

You are a character that needs to survive the zombie invasion, go past waves of zombies, or get past the zombie maze, and defeat the boss(the boss shoot red balls) and you are equipped with 3 guns, a rifle, and shotgun, and a pistol.

There are 3 zombies, a basic zombie, a speedy zombie, and a tanky zombie.

Beware and survive as much waves as possible, my best is 12 waves(HARD)

Thanks for downloading and please support.

sprites: https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-survivor-player

controls:

W,A,S,D is movement.

T is restart

click is shoot

schroll(middleclick) is change weapon

space = something strange
